text: 3.18: Ais 50.6; 53.5; Ru 24.27; 24.44; FG 26.22; 1 Pi 1.10-11Mba tɨv fhum Fhe Bakɨme won kamthooŋ gumgi ga suaŋgim, mbe mba kameŋ suaŋgi. Kha guma, ana ana farasarigi, ana taagip wo gumgi gu mbigi ndirga, ana fharav zaa ndigirga. Nde ntigem khar muuŋgi bigeŋ ne Fhe Bakɨme suaŋgi kamera zɨn vugav mba tegi.
